column3: str

Eshana longs to know what tomorrow brings.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Gather prophetic stones from Pike Falls.
Deliver the prophetic stones to the Ananta whispermaid.
Report to Eshana.
The Velodyna Gatekeepers have done excellent work thus far monitoring our borders, but Alpa fears they grow complacent for lack of any serious threatsss.
In the hopesss of motivating them, I thought we might revive one of the Ananta's more ancient traditions─divinationsss.
To divine the fortunes of war, custom dictates one versssed in its art gather three precious stones required for the ritual. I can think of none better than you for this task.
When you have procured the gems we require, deliver them to the Ananta whissspermaid.
To read the fortunes of war I require three prophetic ssstones. No more, no lesss. Bring them to me and all shall be revealed.
You are returned. Have you the prophetic ssstones I require?
These shall do nicely. Now, let us sssee what the future holds for the Velodyna Gatekeepers.
Yesss, the misssts are clearing.
Great peril awaits in the days ahead. Calamity born from carelessness. They would do well not to lose focusss lest this future come to pass.
Ah! I see great successs for the Gatekeepers! The efforts of their training shall be returned three─nay, four-fold!
Ahem. My apologies. 'Tis not often fortune sssmiles so favorably upon us.
Ah! Great fortune awaits the Gatekeepers! An unexpected windfall for the benefit of all!
Ahem. Forgive me. It has been too long since fortune has sssmiled upon us so favorably.
Hmmm... The future is riddled with uncertainty, but I sssense the potential for discord within our ranksss. Geniality is more important now than ever.
I foresee a fortuitous meeting. Newly formed ties should be treated with the greatessst of care. In doing so we shall not want for allies in times of strife.
The power of the stones is spent, and thusss the vision ends.
I would stay, but my sisters in Vira Nilya have need of my insssight. Pray tell Eshana what I have seen.
Welcome back, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. What did she have to say of our future? What fortune awaitsss the Gatekeepers?
Interesting... I will make certain my sssisters hear of this and act accordingly. The word of a whissspermaid is not to be taken lightly.

Though not always clear, their divinations remain in our thoughts, guiding our actions in the hopes of a desirable outcome. I daresay you too would do well to adhere to her words. It may prove to your benefit.
